solution_line_template: While camping there was {rain_day1} + {rain_day2} + {rain_day3} = <<{rain_day1}+{rain_day2}+{rain_day3}={total_rain_camping}>>{total_rain_camping} mm of rain in 3 days.
Greg experienced {rain_at_house} – {total_rain_camping} = <<{rain_at_house}-{total_rain_camping}={less_rain_camping}>>{less_rain_camping} mm less rain at the campsite.
